###
**As a** catalog administrator, 
I want to create a new product in the catalog 
so that it can be available to users.

###
Acceptance Criteria:
```
Product can be created with required fields (name, description, price, category).

Product ID is generated automatically.

Newly created product appears in the catalog list.

Validation errors are shown for missing or invalid data.
```
